meanings.definition: The state of being joined or linked together.
meanings.sent1: The connectedness of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete.
meanings.sent2: The connectedness of the train tracks allowed for smooth transportation.
meanings.sent3: The connectedness of the team's ideas led to a hilarious misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: The connectedness of the internet has revolutionized communication.
meanings.sent5: The connectedness of the roots created a strong foundation for the tree.

meanings.definition: The quality of forming a logical or meaningful relationship.
meanings.sent1: The connectedness of the plot twists kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent2: The connectedness of the evidence helped solve the case.
meanings.sent3: The connectedness of the characters' actions in the story was surprisingly amusing.
meanings.sent4: The connectedness of the ideas sparked a creative breakthrough.
meanings.sent5: The connectedness of the colors in the painting added depth and meaning.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being close or in touch with others.
meanings.sent1: The connectedness she felt with her friends brought her joy.
meanings.sent2: The connectedness of the family members was evident during the reunion.
meanings.sent3: The connectedness she felt with her favorite book character made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The connectedness of the music resonated deeply with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The connectedness of the community made everyone feel supported.
